name: LACK OF LUCK
description:
Lack of luck is a game about a character trapped in a bad luck world and in order to free himself he have to collect six good luck charms located in different places .

Use arrow keys to control the player.

Player also have the ability to climb wall but anyone can play the game without it

however you can experiment with it to find new ways to complete the game.
